title: Kourtney Kardashian critiques Sofia Richie's makeup in hot tub
text:
They're trying their best to be friends for the sake of their family.

But Kourtney Kardashian couldn't help but critique her ex-boyfriend's new girlfriend while on holiday in Finland.

The 40-year-old reality star turned lifestyle blogger insisted that Sofia Richie's makeup wasn't 'blended' and gave her a few pointers while in a hot tub with Scott Disick and their three children.

While the trio relaxed in the bubbling water, Kourtney made notice of a minor issue with Sofia's look.

The girls were both wearing matching grey beanies with their bikinis as they sat near Scott and the kids.

'It's, like, not blended from ... right here,' the Poosh enthusiast told Sofia as she circled around her face.

'Then you just have to rub it like,' Kourtney explained after questioning if Sofia even had the right tools to do her makeup.

'Is it all wrong?' the daughter of Lionel Richie asked before the eldest Kardashian child answered: 'There's like a literal line.'

Scott wasn't too pleased with the back-and-forth banter and pleaded with the women to change pace.

'We flew to Finland to get in the hot tub,' he said as Mason, Reign and Penelope splashed around. 'Should we get out?'

'You're so negative,' Kourtney quipped. 'Has anyone ever told you?'

After describing an enchanting afternoon with their children, she mentioned that Scott was downcast the entire time.

'You definitely were looking for a reason to leave,' she said. 'You just could have said this isn't for me and we're gonna go.'

Kourtney and Scott dated on-and-off for nearly 10 years and had three children together but finally went their separate ways in 2015; he's dated Sofia for more than one year.

Keeping Up with the Kardashians airs Sundays at 9 p.m. on the E! network.
